name: Sevens - Popular Card Game
description:
Familiar with classic games such as Solitaire Victory!
From "PRO.APP" series which is totally downloaded 8 million,
Here comes "Sevens" which popular as a classic game.

It's stress free! That's runs smoothly.
You can't stop playing anymore! There are many things which you are hooked on!

Which type are you when you put down the card?
Putting down the card actively or keep the cards to obstruct others?
Let's aim to the max rank with your technique.

* You can enjoy to choose rules as you like!

You can enjoy gaming of 4 player who has unique AI co-op.

- You can play with each 20 character has own strength and personality.
- Limited 3 character appears in rare case.
- Other, limited strongest 3 characters!?

We have many settings which you can choose.
- Number of pass, Strategy pass
- Number of Joker, rules
- A-K Link, Tunnel

It's stress free that more kindly function included.

- Auto sort by Suit : How about is my cards?
- Highlight : Which card can I put down?
- Card Confirmation : Oops! I put wrong card down.
- Automatic Pass : You don't have the card which put down.
- Double Speed : When it's feel slow, tap to speed up.
- Filter : Prevent to your cards become too bad.

* It's exciting that factor of unique are included.

2 game mode included : You can play deeply.

- Challenge : Aim to the top.
- Custom : Play the game to select strength.
- Rank/Strength : There are 4 stage like "S","A","B","C"

It' more fun that bonus game is included too!

- Chance Time : The time score is doubled occurs everyday.
- The time score is 5 times occurs rare.
- The opponent is special character in special time.

* Enjoy long time with many helpful options.

- Enjoy that up your level to become high.
- Judge your technique to aim the top.
- Get the stamp to collect everyday as your task.
- Earn total point to aim to highest in world ranking.
- Check your past game record!
- Depending on your feelings, you can change card and background.
- Share your friends by sns, when you win!

Enjoy Sevens in your relax time!
